title: Sensor sample app for Wear
summary: Enjoy millions of the latest Android apps, games, music, movies, TV, books, magazines & more. Anytime, anywhere, across your devices.
description: Test orientation sensor in Android Wear device.Depending on the slope of the device, the appearance of the cube on the screen only change.
descriptionHTML:
Test orientation sensor in Android Wear device.
Depending on the slope of the device, the appearance of the cube on the screen only change.
comments: Works perfectly. I needed to test the Gryoscope on my Moto360 to see if it was working properly, and this app did a great job. The cube wasn't turning around at all which meant that the Gryoscope wasn't working properly, as I feared, and when testing on a new device, I used this to confirm the results and found the cube to turn as it should on a working Gyroscope. Very useful tool.
